    ğŸŒ Frontend DependenciesÂ¶

    CSS FrameworkÂ¶

    ğŸ› ï¸ Development ToolsÂ¶

    RequiredÂ¶

    • Python 3.12+
    • pip
    • virtualenv or venv
    • Git

    OptionalÂ¶

    • Docker
    • Docker Compose
    • Make

    ğŸ“± Hardware RequirementsÂ¶

    Minimum SpecificationsÂ¶

    • CPU: 1.0 GHz dual-core
    • RAM: 2GB
    • Storage: 500MB free space
    • Network: WiFi capability

    Recommended SpecificationsÂ¶

    • CPU: 2.0 GHz quad-core
    • RAM: 4GB
    • Storage: 1GB free space
    • Network: WiFi 5 (802.11ac)

    ğŸ”§ System RequirementsÂ¶

    Operating System SupportÂ¶

    • Linux (Ubuntu 20.04+, Debian 11+)
    • macOS (10.15+)
    • Windows 10/11

    Browser SupportÂ¶

    • Chrome 90+
    • Firefox 90+
    • Safari 14+
    • Edge 90+

    âš™ï¸ Environment VariablesÂ¶

    Required environment variables: 

    1
2
3
4
    FLASK_APP=run.py
FLASK_ENV=development
SECRET_KEY=your_secret_key
DATABASE_URL=sqlite:///data/database.sql

    Optional environment variables: 

    1
2
3
    DEBUG=True
TESTING=False
LOG_LEVEL=INFO

    ğŸ“ Version ManagementÂ¶

    This project uses semantic versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH): - MAJOR: Incompatible API changes - MINOR: Backwards-compatible features - PATCH: Backwards-compatible bug fixes

    ğŸ”„ Dependency UpdatesÂ¶

    To update all dependencies to their latest versions: 

    1
    pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt

    To check for outdated packages: 

    1
    pip list --outdated
